title: FS: T210 Berger, Hannifan, and Becker
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS: T210 Berger, Hannifan, and Becker
posts.post_content:
For sale are three very nice T210's. The Berger is one of the more interesting cards in the set and a different pose. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers. All prices include shipping. 

Berger- $Sold

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=242907&d=1472163592[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=242908&d=1472163611[/IMG]

Hannafin- $70 Delivered

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=242909&d=1472163621[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=242910&d=1472163630[/IMG]

Becker- $45 Delivered
